# GAM analysis Fluid Balance

```{r}
# Build the model
model <- gam(fluid_balance_72  ~
                         s(leaking_index) + age_fixed + gender + apache_iv + final_charlson_score + fluid_balance
                         ,data=selected_df_fluid) 
# Make predictions
predictions <- model %>% predict(selected_df_fluid)
# Model performance
data.frame(
  RMSE = RMSE(predictions, selected_df_fluid$fluid_balance_72),
  R2 = R2(predictions, selected_df_fluid$fluid_balance_72)
)
summary(model)
ggplot(selected_df_fluid, aes(leaking_index, fluid_balance_72) ) +
  stat_smooth(method = gam, formula = y ~ s(x)) +
  ggtitle("GAM Model for Leaking Index and Fluid Balance") +
  labs(y="Fluid Balance 72hrs", x = "Leaking Index")

b <- getViz(model)
plot( sm(b, 1) )
```

```{r}
# Build the model
model <- gam(fluid_balance_72_bin  ~
                         s(leaking_index) + age_fixed + gender + apache_iv + final_charlson_score + fluid_balance
                         ,data=selected_df_fluid, family = binomial)
# Make predictions
predictions <- model %>% predict(selected_df_fluid)
# Model performance
data.frame(
  RMSE = RMSE(predictions, selected_df_fluid$fluid_balance_72_bin),
  R2 = R2(predictions, selected_df_fluid$fluid_balance_72_bin)
)
summary(model)
ggplot(selected_df_fluid, aes(leaking_index, fluid_balance_72_bin) ) +
  stat_smooth(method = gam, formula = y ~ s(x)) +
  ggtitle("GAM Model for Leaking Index and Fluid Balance") +
  labs(y="Fluid Balance 72hrs", x = "Leaking Index")

b <- getViz(model)
plot( sm(b, 1) )
```
